resources.string: Lets\'s make sure nobody\'s impersonating you
Please take a selfie to help us confirm your liveness. We need you to perform a simple sequence of action within the defined time limit.
Please take a selfie to help us confirm your identity. Would not take more than a minute.
• Position your face in available face area\n• Make sure you have a good lightning\n• Hold your phone at eye level and look straight to the camera, then follow the instruction.
Your data is not be saved on our system.
